EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Contract Acknowledgement Form (1342195675.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Max, Understood I will reach out to her and let you know. Here are some other notaries: Los Angeles, CA Paul Alemann1400 N. Edgemont St, Apt 302, Los Angeles, CA 90027310-709-6882Every day, though hours vary; call for appointmentFees vary by locationLos Angeles and Orange CountiesYesValentine517-980-4825Hollywood Notary4025 W.Adams Blvd., #8 Los Angeles, CA 90018323-393-58229:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. M-F, 1:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. Sat and Sun$10 per I-9 at home office, fees vary elsewhere (call for details)Los Angeles CountyYesRoadrunner Notary Services- Varouj Asdourian12033 Nugent Dr., Granada Hill, CA 91344818-326-12518:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. M-F, 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Sat, 10:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Sun$45 per I-9 within 51 miles, $60 from 51 to 61 milesSimi Valley, Moorpark, Westlake Village, Thousand Oaks, and Newbury Party. All Los Angeles except Long Beach, Whittier, Sante Fe Springs, Torrance, and points south. Yes ___________________________________ -----Original Message----- From: Max Katz [mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2012 6:38 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Contract Acknowledgement Form Sara, Okay, I finagled with Calvin Group and I think they're willing to do it without the contract as we discussed. They still need to get approval from Irena in order to do that. She wasn't in the office today, but the number to the Calvin Group office is (310) 287 - 2400 and her extension is 307. Go ahead and get in touch with her directly and -PLEASE- try to make something work. Let me know if they're on-board with that. As for Valentine, he called me yesterday at noon advising I take the rail out to Pasadena.I've never heard of a notary that didn't travel, and I'm not taking the two-hour ride each direction to make that happen, so I'll look for an alternative. -Max On Wed, Jul 11, 2012 at 12:49 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:> Just in case…> > http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Contract_Acknowledgement <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Contract_Acknowledgement>> _Form.pdf> > > > > > ___________________________________> > SARA CONDE> > Consultant Services Advisor> > MBO Partners> > > > t: 703.793.6028> > f: 703.793.6068> > e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> > w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com>> > > > Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. > They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If > you have received this email in error please notify > postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.> >
